text: Mohammed Al-Mfarah, also known as Abu Samah () (May 20, 1945 â€“ January 23, 2018), was a Saudi Arabian actor, playwright, director and producer. He was born in Al-Zilfi, Saudi Arabia. He worked at the ministry of health and submitted his resignation in 1975. Al-Mfarah was known for his movie roles in Al-Saknat Fe Klobna (), Secretary in the House, Ahtarq Al-Samah (), and Abo Samah Fe Fanaq Al-Samrine (). He also appeared in the plays Al-Mohsan () and Bokor Wa kolampor (). Al-Mfarah died in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia on January 23, 2018 of laryngeal cancer at the age of 72. ==References== ==Other websites== *Riyadh newspaper Category:1945 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from laryngeal cancer Category:Saudi Arabian people Category:Civil servants Category:Movie actors Category:Television actors Category:Stage actors Category:Movie directors Category:Movie producers Category:Playwrights
title: Mohammed Al-Mfarah
